body:
Comment 2: 
Even after making goinstall setup CGOFILES correctly, you almost always have to get
CGO_LDFLAGS set properly for the target system.  The eventual fix is going to be to
check that Makefile is well-formed and then use it.
_Labels changed: added **cgo**._ _Owner changed to **r...@golang.org**._ _Status changed to **Accepted**._
